group_1.textCenter: ...Okay! Amazing work, everyone!@We can officially call it a wrap!

group_1.textLeft: Y'know... this feels like one heck of an@accomplishment!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?@Oh my gosh, am I actually crying...?
I hope we can film another movie with this@group some time!

group_1.textLeft: Movies really are awesome, aren't they...?

group_1.textRight: Let's go celebrate at a family restaurant!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry. I'm gonna be busy with the editing@for the next little while...

group_1.textRight: Is it a lot of work?
Aw... I feel like you could go easy on yourself@just for today.

group_1.textLeft: Well, we can't hold a wrap party without the@director, so...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we'll just schedule it for another time.
I can't wait to see it when it's finished!

group_1.textCenter: (Alright. Let's begin editing, shall we?)
(Usable takes... these two should do.)
(Adjust the cut between the takes...)
(Huh...? The saturation on this shot clashes@pretty hard...)
(Correct that... adjust the timing to match...)
…………[wait:1.0][chara:303901:lipSynch_1]Whew.
(Yikes, it took a whole hour to edit that one@scene...)
(Whoever said that the filming process is just@"gathering the raw materials" was right.)
(Every part of Director Joey's work was@first-rate, including the editing...)
(So I'm not gonna cut a single corner@either...!)
And finally... in goes the sofubi kaiju!
*Giggle*...
I've spent a lot of free time experimenting@with different combinations of effects.
This is the payoff of all the research I did@into techniques...
...For getting a realistic look on short notice@with just chroma-keying.
*Giggle*.
...*Gasp!* I got so absorbed, I almost lost@track of time.
Just as it switches from the security camera@to cellphone footage...
The kaiju comes into full view...!
I more or less expected it to work, but it@really does fit like a glove.
Gahh, it went so perfectly it's almost scary!@And filming it was a blast.
I really hope I can keep making movies from now@on, too...
Even after I've graduated, grown up, become an@old granny...
Alright!
This is guaranteed to get Dad on the same page@as me!

group_1.narration: As I imported the data and cut the footage@together, it slowly grew into something@even better than I'd pictured.
The further I worked, the more eagerly I came@to expect Dad's approval of it.
